ServerError: The server encountered an internal error...

index.tagline: A Web platform for writing and publishing Laban scores.

login.title: Login to Signa
login.signup_tooltip: Click on the « Signup » button to create a new user account.

signup.title: Signup to Signa
signup.mail_help: The email address will be used for account validation and as a recipient of authorized messages.
signup.login_help: The login will only be used for the connection to Signa.
signup.password_help: The password must be at least 8 characters long, including at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter <u>and</u> one number, without spaces or special characters.
signup.validation_link:
Dear %s,
 
Please click on this link to confirm your signup at Signa, or copy/paste it into your browser.

forgotpassword.title: Forgotten password
forgotpassword.login_help: An email allowing you to reset the password will be sent to the address related to your login.
forgotpassword.validation_link:
Dear %s,
 
Please click on this link to reset your password for Signa, or copy/paste it into your browser.

forgotlogin.title: Forgotten login
forgotlogin.email_help: An email allowing you to retrieve your login will be sent to the given address.
forgotlogin.mail_content_single:
You asked for the Signa login related to your email address in order to reset the password.
 
Here is your login : %s
forgotlogin.mail_content_many:
You asked for the Signa login related to your email address in order to reset the password.
 
Here are the logins related to your email address:
    %s
